title: Introduction to Airsafety Package
text: Airsafety package contains airline safety data includes Shiny Application user interactively learn safety airlines around world. vignette show access app check rating airlines using airsafety package.

title: Introduction to Airsafety Package
text: First, load/download Airsafety package! Next can access airline safety data, shiny app rating functions following steps:

previous_headings: What is airsafety package? > How to use airsafety package?
title: Introduction to Airsafety Package
text: airsafety package includes built-dataset safetydata, data frame 336 rows 5 variables. glimpse data set: details dataset can found using function help(safetydata)
code: library(dplyr) glimpse(safetydata) #> Rows: 336 #> Columns: 5 #> $ airline                <chr> "Aer Lingus", "Aeroflot", "Aerolineas Argentina… #> $ avail_seat_km_per_week <dbl> 320906734, 1197672318, 385803648, 596871813, 18… #> $ year_range             <fct> 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99… #> $ type_of_event          <chr> "incidents", "incidents", "incidents", "inciden… #> $ n_events               <int> 2, 76, 6, 3, 2, 14, 2, 3, 5, 7, 3, 21, 1, 5, 4,…

previous_headings: What is airsafety package? > How to use airsafety package?
title: Introduction to Airsafety Package
text: run R shiny application, following code: information use app can found section application.

previous_headings: What is airsafety package? > How to use airsafety package?
title: Introduction to Airsafety Package
text: Without running Shiny Application, can also check rating airlines using functions airsafety package. Please note 56 airlines listed built-data set safetydata rated airline safety. airline_rating0() : calculate rating details : help(airline_rating0)  airline_rating() : state rating sentence details : help(airline_rating)

text: information functions mentioned functions use Shiny Application included airsafety package, please refer pkgdown site.

text: Note : functions mentioned included package embedded R Shiny application purposes. Please refer link section : “Want know package?”

what: safetydata : Access the Airline Safety Data
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: airsafety package includes built-dataset safetydata, data frame 336 rows 5 variables. glimpse data set: details dataset can found using function help(safetydata)
code: library(dplyr) glimpse(safetydata) #> Rows: 336 #> Columns: 5 #> $ airline                <chr> "Aer Lingus", "Aeroflot", "Aerolineas Argentina… #> $ avail_seat_km_per_week <dbl> 320906734, 1197672318, 385803648, 596871813, 18… #> $ year_range             <fct> 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99, 85_99… #> $ type_of_event          <chr> "incidents", "incidents", "incidents", "inciden… #> $ n_events               <int> 2, 76, 6, 3, 2, 14, 2, 3, 5, 7, 3, 21, 1, 5, 4,…

what: rating_app() : Run the R Shiny Application
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: run R shiny application, following code: information use app can found section application.

what: airline_rating0()& airline_rating() : Check Rating of An Airline
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Without running Shiny Application, can also check rating airlines using functions airsafety package. Please note 56 airlines listed built-data set safetydata rated airline safety. airline_rating0() : calculate rating details : help(airline_rating0)  airline_rating() : state rating sentence details : help(airline_rating)

title: Airline Rating — airline_rating
text: State rating airline 56 listed safetydata based input.

title: Airline Rating — airline_rating
text: name airline name listed safetydata, typed lowercase uppercase acceptable

title: Airline Rating — airline_rating
code: airline_rating("All Nippon Airways") #> [1] "ALL NIPPON AIRWAYS has rating of 5 / 5!" airline_rating("QANTAS") #> [1] "QANTAS has rating of 5 / 5!" airline_rating("garuda indonesia") #> [1] "GARUDA INDONESIA has rating of 4 / 5!"

title: Airline Rating0 — airline_rating0
text: Calculate rating airline 56 listed safetydata based input.

title: Airline Rating0 — airline_rating0
text: name airline name listed safetydata, typed lowercase uppercase, even mixed, acceptable

title: Airline Rating0 — airline_rating0
code: airline_rating("All Nippon Airways") #> [1] "ALL NIPPON AIRWAYS has rating of 5 / 5!" airline_rating("QANTAS") #> [1] "QANTAS has rating of 5 / 5!" airline_rating("garuda inDOnesia") #> [1] "GARUDA INDONESIA has rating of 4 / 5!"

title: Airline Safety Data — safetydata
text: dataset contains information number airlines' incidents, fatal accidents, fatalities available seat kilometers per week, focusing year 1985-1999 2000-2014.

title: Airline Safety Data — safetydata
text: data frame 336 rows 5 variables. airline Airline name avail_seat_km_per_week Available seat kilometers flown every week year_range Range year (1985-1999 & 2000-2014) type_of_event Types events happened : incidents, fatal accidents, fatalities n_events Total number event happened

title: Airline Safety Data — safetydata
text: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/master/data/2018/2018-08-07/week19_airline_safety.csv

what: Safetydata with Ratings and Logo — safetydata_ratePic
title: Safetydata with Ratings and Logo — safetydata_ratePic
text: Transform airesafety::safetydata dataset wide-format add new columns calculate rating add urls airline tail logo, creating modified dataset 56 rows 14 variables.
